interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/07/13 Average Rating: 3.9 Product Details: {'Subtitles': ['None available'], 'Directors': ['Takuya Igarashi', 'Yasuhiro Irie', 'Tensai Okamura', 'Takefumi Anzai', 'Shin Matsuo', 'Ikurô Satô', 'Daisuke Chiba', 'Shingo Kaneko', 'Yoshiyuki Asai', 'Toshinori Narita']} Review Text: I have been purchasing a few of my Favorite Episodes of the Anime "Soul Eater" using Amazon Instant Video, and I want to say that I am very pleased! I have always enjoyed this animated series.. "Soul Eater" is a very funny and engaging show with very memorable characters.

It is nice to have a few of my most favorite episodes to watch when ever I want. The quality of the videos is, in my opinion, excellent! Especially the episodes that are available in HD.

The Series itself is nicely done, and follows a number of students in the DWMA (Death Weapon Meister Academy) as they learn to work with their partners and protect the world from evil. Review Title: Excellent (and Fun) Animated Series Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Coming Home VHS Jane Fonda (Actor), Jon Voight (Actor), Hal Ashby (Director) & 0 more Rated: R Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Studio Specials, MGM Home Entertainment, All MGM Titles ['Amazon.com', "Both Jane Fonda and Jon Voight won Oscars for their performances in this profoundly moving 1978 flick dealing with the aftereffects of the Vietnam War. Fonda, feeling isolated while her hawkish husband, Bruce Dern, is away in Vietnam, follows a friend's example and volunteers at a veteran's hospital. There she is reacquainted with Voight, an old friend who has returned from the war as a paraplegic. Lonely and disconnected from her husband, Fonda finds love, and fulfilling sex, with Voight. The sex scenes, very steamy for the time, are still provocative. This mature love story is about expanding your horizons, and is both moving and thoughtful. Director Hal Ashby (", 'Harold and Maude', ') does succumb to melodrama on occasion, but these are forgivable slips.', "--Rochelle O'Gorman"] {'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.13 Ounces', 'Director': 'Hal Ashby', 'Run time': '2 hours and 7 minutes', 'Release date': 'July 8, 1997', 'Date First Available': 'September 29, 2006', 'Actors': 'Jane Fonda, Jon Voight, Bruce Dern, Penelope Milford, Robert Carradine', 'Studio': 'MGM (Video & DVD)', 'Producers': 'Bruce Gilbert, Jerome Hellman', 'Writers': 'Nancy Dowd, Robert C. Jones, Rudy Wurlitzer, Waldo Salt'} I bought this VHS tape as a gift for a good friend of mine. She had owned a copy of it and was very happy to get another one! Very Nice! A Star Is Born VHS Barbra Streisand (Actor), Kris Kristofferson (Actor), Frank Pierson (Director, Writer) & 0 more Rated: R Format: VHS Tape Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Drama ['Product description', 'Guaranteed to work or your money back - PLEASE NOTE ALL MONIES FROM THIS SALE GO TO A 501 (C)3 NO KILL ANIMAL SHELTER', 'Amazon.com', 'This film actually began with the idea of remaking', 'A Star Is Born', 'with the then-hot couple James Taylor and Carly Simon. Eventually, it evolved into this vanity production for Barbra Streisand, with Kris Kristofferson as the designated stud muffin. The story remains the same: A superstar on the decline meets a young singer on the way up. They marry as their career trajectories intersect, and his eventual demise is meant as a sacrifice to further boost her career by ridding her of the burden of him. Kristofferson\'s rock & roll numbers are decidedly lousy--Hollywood\'s idea of rock music--and Streisand looks good and always sounds fine (she won an Oscar for cowriting the song "Evergreen"). But you can feel her heavy hand guiding every shot; she seems to serve as puppet master for director Frank Pierson, framing every image of herself for maximum glow. The ultimate date flick (if the guy can sit still through it).', '--Marshall Fine'] {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 4.19 x 1.12 inches; 6.08 Ounces', 'Director': 'Frank Pierson', 'Run time': '2 hours and 19 minutes', 'Release date': 'April 15, 1992', 'Date First Available': 'December 7, 2006', 'Actors': 'Barbra Streisand, Kris Kristofferson, Gary Busey, Oliver Clark, Venetta Fields', 'Studio': 'Warner Home Video', 'Writers': 'Alvin Sargent, Frank Pierson, Jay Presson Allen, Joan Didion, John Gregory Dunne'} I purchased this VHS tape as a gift for a friend. She had owned a copy of it some time ago.. and was hoping to get another one! profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest:** The user exhibits a robust enthusiasm for classic films with complex narratives while increasingly embracing modern animated series. Their recent purchase underscores a deep appreciation for humor and character-driven storytelling, particularly in series that balance engaging plots with memorable characters.

- **Media Format Preference:** The user continues to value vintage formats like VHS tapes but is actively utilizing digital platforms to diversify their viewing experience. This adaptability indicates a commitment to accessing high-quality content in various formats, particularly for their favorite animated series.

- **Interpersonal Connection:** The user's thoughtful nature shines through their enjoyment of sharing cinematic and animated treasures with friends. Their recent focus on purchasing select episodes reflects a desire to connect deeply over shared interests in engaging narratives.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user prioritizes quality and mature themes in their media choices. Their high ratings for favored series highlight a strong emotional resonance with well-crafted storytelling, emphasizing a discerning taste for content that offers depth and humor.

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user consistently rates content highly when it aligns with their interests, reiterating their passion for recognizing and supporting noteworthy releases.

Overall, this user cherishes profound cinematic and animated experiences, enjoys nostalgically revisiting vintage formats, and values the joy of sharing their viewing experiences while expanding their collection to encompass a variety of storytelling mediums.
